law.full_text:
NO WAIVER OF RIGHTS.
Except for bona fide collective bargaining agreements, any waiver by a Hotel Worker of any or all of the provisions of this article shall be deemed contrary to public policy and shall be void and unenforceable. Any attempt by a Hotel Employer to have a Hotel Worker waive rights given by this article shall constitute a violation of this article.

unit.catch_line: Payment Of Minimum Compensation To Hotel Workers.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
NO WAIVER OF RIGHTS. (§ 104.112)
NO WAIVER OF RIGHTS. Except for bona fide collective bargaining agreements, any waiver by a Hotel Worker of any or all of the provisions of this article shall be deemed contrary to public policy and shall be void and unenforceable. Any attempt by a Hotel Employer to have a Hotel Worker waive rights given by this article shall constitute a violation of this article.
